personas_with_mappings.persona_name: United States Enterprise SaaS - Product Leaders

mappings.pain_point: Product leaders at enterprise SaaS companies struggle to coordinate cross-functional releases, causing delayed launches and lost revenue.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management centralizes release plans and dependency tracking across teams, reducing cross-team coordination time by up to 40% and accelerating time-to-market.

mappings.pain_point: PMOs lack visibility into feature dependencies and technical debt, causing scope creep and unexpected engineering effort.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management maps dependencies and surfaces technical debt in a single roadmap, improving estimate accuracy and cutting scope surprises by ~30%.

mappings.pain_point: Individual product managers waste hours reconciling status across spreadsheets and chat, reducing strategic work and slowing feature delivery.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management consolidates status, automates updates and frees 5+ hours/week per PM for roadmap and strategy work.

mappings.pain_point: Cross-functional handoffs between product and engineering result in rework and quality issues, raising defect rates and support costs.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management standardizes handoff workflows and integrates with engineering tools to reduce rework and lower defect rates by up to 25%.

mappings.pain_point: Senior leaders can't aggregate portfolio health across 50–200 PMs, causing missed targets and poor resource prioritization.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management provides real-time portfolio dashboards and roll-up metrics to improve release predictability and forecast accuracy by ~30%.

mappings.pain_point: Scaling product orgs struggle to enforce consistent processes across distributed PM teams, creating onboarding bottlenecks and uneven delivery.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management scales templates and governance across teams, cutting onboarding time by ~50% and enforcing consistent delivery practices.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: United Kingdom Mid-Market Marketing - Campaign Leads

mappings.pain_point: Campaign leads at UK mid-market agencies juggle multiple client campaigns with manual task lists, causing missed deadlines and cost overruns.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management centralizes campaign tasks, timelines and briefs so teams deliver on time, reducing missed deadlines by ~35% and lowering delivery costs.

mappings.pain_point: Approval bottlenecks from clients and internal stakeholders extend campaign timelines and increase unpaid revision work.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management automates approval flows and version tracking, cutting approval cycles by up to 50% and reducing revision churn.

mappings.pain_point: Creative teams lose time searching files and reworking assets due to poor version control, decreasing billable hours.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management integrates with Figma and Drive to centralize assets, improve version control and free ~8+ billable hours per creative per week.

mappings.pain_point: Resource managers can't allocate designers and producers across 10–60 staff efficiently, leading to overbooking and late deliveries.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management's workload views balance assignments across teams, reducing overbooking incidents by ~60% and improving on-time delivery.

mappings.pain_point: Agencies struggle to demonstrate campaign ROI to UK clients, weakening renewals and upsell conversations.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management consolidates campaign metrics and client-ready reports, improving renewal conversations and increasing upsell win-rates by ~20%.

personas_with_mappings.persona_name: US Federal Large Public Sector - Program Leads

mappings.pain_point: Program leads in federal agencies lack auditable, centralized records of decisions and task histories, risking non-compliance during inspections.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management creates centralized task histories and permissioned logs to support audits, ensuring traceability for 100% of program actions.

mappings.pain_point: Large multi-year modernization programs suffer schedule slippage due to siloed workstreams, risking funding and citizen-service delays.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management aligns portfolios, enforces milestone cadence and highlights risks across workstreams, reducing schedule slippage by up to 30%.

mappings.pain_point: PMOs spend weeks assembling status reports for oversight bodies, diverting staff from delivery and increasing operational cost.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management automates roll-up reporting and exports for oversight, cutting reporting time by up to 70% and freeing program staff for delivery.

mappings.pain_point: Inter-agency coordination is impeded by inconsistent processes and manual handoffs, increasing contract and vendor management risk.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management standardizes cross-agency intake and vendor workflows, reducing coordination overhead by ~40% and lowering vendor disputes.

mappings.pain_point: Security and access controls across 100–500 staff are complex, increasing risk of unauthorized data exposure and compliance gaps.
mappings.value_proposition: Asana Work Management enforces enterprise access controls, SSO and admin policies to reduce administrative access errors by ~80% and support federal governance.
